mapper.select: select notice_id,notice_title,notice_content,notice_write_date,notice_view_count,member_id,(select member_username from member where notice.member_id=member.member_id) as member_username from notice order by notice_id desc
select member_username from member where member_id = #{value}

select notice_id, prevNum, nextNum, (select notice_title from notice where notice_id=prevNum) as prevTitle, (select notice_title from notice where notice_id=nextNum) as nextTitle, (select member_id from notice where notice_id=prevNum) as prevMember, (select member_id from notice where notice_id=nextNum) as nextMember from (select notice_id, lag(notice_id,1,0) over(order by notice_id desc) as nextNum, lead(notice_id,1,0) over(order by notice_id desc) as prevNum from notice) where notice_id= #{value}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_content= #{notice_content} where notice_id = #{notice_id}
update notice set notice_view_count = notice_view_count + 1 where notice_id = #{notice_id}
